original_text: The whole assembly of Judah, and the priests and the Levites, and the whole assembly that came out of Israel, and the sojourners who came out of the land of Israel, and the sojourners who lived in Judah, rejoiced.
korean_text: 유다 온 회중과 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 이스라엘에서 온 모든 회중과 이스라엘 땅에서 나온 나그네들과 유다에 사는 나그네들이 다 즐거워하였으므로

sentences.original_text: the whole assembly that came out of Israel
the sojourners who came out of the land of Israel
the sojourners who lived in Judah
